channel.title: [317] help!
channel.description: Hi i am new. So i wanted to know a few things. I downloaded a client and a server called " Godz corruptions" So i made a account and i want to make my self an owner. But idk how to. And i wan't to be my server 'client' online meaning other people access my game. Any one can help? please... i went to no ip.com w/e it is and downloaded that everything and i followed everything. Except for few things. Or if some one can help me make my own server + client and stuff (make it online) please can you? thanks! also if u do i want my name to be on the game Tom and make me owner and all of those cool things. THANKS!

item.title: [317] help!
item.dc:creator: @TempahScape TempahScape
item.description:
@TempahScape wrote:

To change yourself to owner, in your server folder, go to characters, then find your name, open the txt document, and change the rights to 3

Read full topic

Actually nah but we can go over skype and u can lead me thru it?
because i kinda don’t trust people ruining my computer (no offense but even my mom said let me do it for u i would still say no)
don’t take it as offensive or anything but yeah
Skype - legendrock7
so tell me if u wanna do that or not ?
or if u really wanna do team viewer i will do that

item.title: [317] help!
item.dc:creator: @Danwasadog Danwasadog
item.description:
@Danwasadog wrote:

I Have The Same Sort Of Problems, I Haven’t Managed To Get A Working No-Ip Server.
I Just Used Hamachi, Only Problem Is People Have To Join You Hamachi Group.
Other Than That Hamachi Is Great.
I Would Like Help To Get a Working No-Ip, If Anyone Can Help me With The Port Forwarding It Would Be Much Appreciated.

I Just Don’t Get Portforwarding On My Modem, Its Wierd.
I Understand What It Does But My Modem is Weird.
Lol

item.title: [317] help!
item.dc:creator: @legendrock7 legendrock7
item.description:
@legendrock7 wrote:

Hi i am new. So i wanted to know a few things. I downloaded a client and a server called " Godz corruptions"
So i made a account and i want to make my self an owner. But idk how to. And i wan’t to be my server ‘client’ online meaning other people access my game.
Any one can help? please…
i went to no ip.com w/e it is and downloaded that everything and i followed everything. Except for few things.
Or if some one can help me make my own server + client and stuff (make it online) please can you?
thanks! also if u do i want my name to be on the game Tom and make me owner and all of those cool things.
THANKS!

Read full topic
